arts.ttl: Bayern bosses open up on stalled Kimmich contract talks: "Nobody is above the club"
arts.sum: Bayern Munich bosses Max Eberl and Christoph Freund were asked about Joshua Kimmich's uncertain future after Friday's game against Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. VfB Stuttgart; Real Madrid out on Joshua Kimmich; Pundit has Bayern’s successor to Harry Kane lined up; Everton wants Rayan Cherki; Chelsea, Bayern to spar for BVB’s Jamie Gittens; and MORE!
arts.sum: Bayern Munich hopped on a bus, drove to VfB Stuttgart, slagged through about 44 minutes, and then got it together in time to notch a 3-1 win over a very tough, but massively mistake-prone side from Die Schwaben . Roughly a third of the way through the match and Bayern Munich looked distracted (which might be natural given the Bayer Leverkusen match on Wednesday in the Champions League).

arts.ttl: Leon Goretzka lauds Bayern Munich’s second half in 3-1 win over Stuttgart, João Palhinha’s minutes in midfield
arts.sum: Speaking after the match, Goretzka, who started in place of the injured Joshua Kimmich and Aleksandar Pavlović, recognized that Bayern was able to collectively up their performance in the second half after highlighting what they didn’t do right in the first 45 minutes. It was far from Bayern Munich ’s best performance against VfB Stuttgart, but they came away with a 3-1 victory away from home thanks to goals from Michael Olise, Leon Goretzka, and Kingsley Coman, all of which cancelled out a cracking goal from Angelo Stiller in the 34th minute.

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany savors Bayern Munich victory over VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Bayern Munich understands all of that, so you will have to forgive him for getting caught up in the moment after Kingsley Coman scored late in the game to seal a 3-1 win over VfB Stuttgart. Glitch or not, the coach got wrapped up in the excitement of the moment for what was an extremely hard-fought win over a tough VfB Stuttgart side.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich’s Max Eberl provides positive update on Alphonso Davies injury
arts.sum: Max Eberl says Alphonso Davies took a knock in the first half after the challenge by Jeltsch. Max Eberl says Alphonso Davies took a knock in the first half after the challenge by Jeltsch.

arts.ttl: Man City 'handed Florian Wirtz setback' as Bayern Munich position becomes clear
arts.sum: Karl-Heinz Rummenigge confirms Bayern Munich's interest in signing Manchester City-linked Florian Wirtz from reigning Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Joshua Kimmich 'set contract deadline' by Bayern Munich amid interest from Arsenal
arts.sum: The 30-year-old captain of the Germany men's national team has been a Bayern player for nigh on a decade, having joined the Bavarian giants from RB Leipzig in the summer of 2015.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Joshua Kimmich 'set contract deadline' by Bayern Munich amid interest from Arsenal
arts.sum: The 30-year-old captain of the Germany men's national team has been a Bayern player for nigh on a decade, having joined the Bavarian giants from RB Leipzig in the summer of 2015.

arts.ttl: Arsenal face Joshua Kimmich competition from Premier League rivals?
arts.sum: Liverpool reportedly join Arsenal in the race to sign Bayern Munich midfielder Joshua Kimmich, who is out of contract at the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s opportunistic 3-1 win over VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: After conceding a first half goal, Bayern Munich clawed back three unanswered goals to earn a tough three points at Stuttgart. In his fourth Bundesliga start, Palhinha slowly adjusted to the match and showcased why Bayern paid €51M for him last summer.
